jobTitle.title: Job Title
mailConfirmationSucess: Your email address has been successfully verified. A consultant will review your account and if it complies, your account will be activated within 24 hours.
emailConfirmationFailure: We could not confirm your account as the confirmation link is invalid or has already expired. Please re-register and confirm within the given time frame.
fullStackDeveloperDescription: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Management Informatics, I am developing full stack development skills, leveraging theoretical knowledge received and my initial practical experiences. I work with languages like JavaScript and TypeScript and use modern technologies such as Angular for front-end development and NestJS for the back-end. I am familiarizing myself with the Prisma ORM to optimize database management. Motivated and curious, I aim to establish a solid foundation to effectively contribute to software development projects.
simplifyRecruitment: Simplify your recruitment with us. Post your job offers and let us orchestrate the selection process for you. Reach top talent quickly and efficiently.
postOnPlatform: Post Your Offer on Our Platform and Let Us Find the Talent That Will Transform Your Company.
propelYourCareer: Are you ready to propel your career? Join a community where innovation and technology meet to create the future. Explore roles that challenge and expand your skills within a team that values growth and personal development.
uniqueCareerOpportunities: Discover Unique Career Opportunities with Us.
itProfessionalsFuture: IT Professionals, Your Future Starts Here!
recruitmentAgencyDescriptionPart1: A recruitment agency specialized in IT, offering deep expertise in connecting companies with top talent in the sector.
recruitmentAgencyDescriptionPart2: Operating internationally, we stand out for our personalized approach and commitment to the technological success of our clients.

errors.UnauthorizedConsultant: Only a Consultant can schedule an appointment.
errors.JobClosed: Cannot schedule an appointment: This job offer is already closed.
errors.TimeSlotConflict: You already have an appointment for this time slot.
errors.NotConsultant: This user is not a Consultant.
errors.NoAppointments: You have no appointments for the selected period.
errors.InvalidCandidate: This user is not a Candidate.
errors.AppointmentExists: Cannot proceed: You already have an appointment on

errors.companyNameLong: Please enter a text less than 250 characters.

errors.InvalidDate: The start date cannot be a past date.
errors.WeekendDate: The chosen date falls on a weekend and is not available for appointments.
errors.TimeSlotNotFound: This time slot does not exist.
errors.UnauthorizedCancel: Action not possible: Only the Consultant or the Candidate associated with the appointment can cancel it.
errors.CandidateNotFound: Your appointment is not found, the job offer might be closed.
errors.ConflictUpdate: You already have an appointment for this time slot or you submitted the same information.
errors.no-job-listings-saved: You have no saved job listings.
errors.UnauthorizedCreateAdminConsultant: Only administrators can create Administrators or Consultants.
errors.UserUnderage: The user must be at least 18 years old.
errors.InvalidPhoneNumber: Valid phone number format: (+32, +352, +39, +33, +41, +49, +31) followed by a space and 9 to 11 digits.
errors.InvalidPassword: Must contain at least: 1 uppercase letter, 1 special character, 1 digit.
errors.InvalidRole: Only the roles Administrator or Consultant, External can be assigned.
errors.InvalidFileFormat: The file must be in PDF format.
errors.FileTooLarge: The file must be less than 5MB.
errors.InvalidCompanyDescriptionLength: The company description must be between 10 and 2000 characters.
errors.LogoutError: An error occurred during logout. Please try again.
errors.EmailNotFound: User with this email not found.
errors.InvalidResetCode: Your validation code has expired or is invalid.
errors.userNotCV: This user does not have a CV.
errors.EmailConfirmationInvalid: The email confirmation link is invalid or has expired. Please restart your registration.
errors.ConsultantPermissionDenied: Only Candidates and Recruiters can be modified by a Consultant.
errors.AccountAlreadyVerified: Registration already verified and an email has been sent to the user.
errors.InsufficientPermission: As a consultant, you cannot delete an administrator or another consultant.
errors.CannotSelfDelete: You cannot delete yourself, please go through your profile.
errors.OnlyAdmin: You are the only Administrator, you cannot delete your account.
errors.AdminLimitReached: The maximum number of administrators is reached. There can only be 3 administrators.
errors.AdminOrConsultantOnly: Only Administrator and Consultant roles can be modified here.
errors.AdminOrConsultantRoleOnly: You can only assign the roles 'Administrator' or 'Consultant'.
errors.UnverifiedEmail: This user has not yet confirmed their email address.
errors.SelfModificationNotAllowed: You cannot modify your information here, please go through your profile.
errors.CandidateRoleOnly: Only Candidates and Recruiters can be modified by a Consultant.
errors.InvalidTvaNumber: Valid VAT number format: Belgium (BE) followed by 10 digits; France (FR) followed by 2 letters and 9 digits; Italy (IT) followed by 11 digits; Luxembourg (LU) followed by 8 digits; Netherlands (NL) followed by 9 digits, B, and 2 digits; Germany (DE) followed by 9 digits; Switzerland (CHE) followed by 3 blocks of 3 digits separated by dots followed by 'VAT'.
errors.EmailTooLong: Your email is too long, not more than 100 characters.
errors.PhoneInvalid: Valid phone number format: (+32, +352, +39, +33, +41, +49, +31) followed by a space and 9 to 11 digits.
errors.PasswordTooLong: Your password is too long, not more than 100 characters.
errors.unauthorized-candidate: Only candidates can apply for job offers.
errors.unvalidated-job-listing: Error: This job offer is not yet validated by the team.
errors.duplicate-application: You have already applied for this job.
errors.no-applications-found: No applications found in the database.
errors.no-positive-interviews: No positive interviews found in the database.
errors.no-applications-for-user: No applications found for this Candidate.
errors.no-applications-for-listing: No applications found for this job offer.
errors.unauthorized-view-applications: You are not authorized to view the applications for this job offer.
errors.unauthorized-delete: Only a consultant, an administrator, or the user associated with the application can delete it.
errors.unauthorized-delete-candidate: You are not authorized to delete this application.
errors.already-scheduled-interview:
This candidate is already scheduled for an interview with {consultantName} for the job {jobTitle} at {companyName}.
Please wait for the offer to close.
errors.candidate-limit-reached:
The number ({maxCandidates}) of candidates to be recruited, requested by the client is reached.
Please close this offer!
errors.application-status-same: Status already modified and an email has also been sent to the candidate.
errors.no-interview-notification: This candidate has not yet received the notification email for their application
errors.missing-interview-note: Please add an interview note to the candidate's profile for recruitment.
errors.note-already-exists: This user is not a candidate and/or it is not possible to add a note.
errors.recruitment-limit-reached: The number of candidates to be recruited is reached. Please close the offer.
errors.unauthorized-recruiter: Only the recruiter with their account can create job announcements.
errors.conflict-job-listing:
You have already published an offer for this position.
Please modify the existing offer or create a new offer for another position.
errors.not-found-user-recruiter: This user is not a Recruiter
errors.invalid-filter: Invalid filter. Choose between 'day', 'week', '2 weeks', 'month', or 'all'.
errors.user-not-recruiter: This user is not a recruiter.
errors.unauthorized-view-details: Only a recruiter or the owner of the offer can view the details.
errors.recruiter-has-no-jobs: This recruiter has no published job offers.
errors.no-inactive-jobs: No inactive jobs found in the database.
errors.no-jobs-to-validate: No jobs to validate found in the database.
errors.no-jobs-with-deadline-today: No jobs with an application deadline today found in the database.
errors.no-jobs-with-expired-deadline: No jobs with expired application deadlines.
errors.unauthorized-update-job: You are not authorized to modify this job announcement.
errors.job-title-already-exists: You have already published an offer for this position. Please modify the existing offer or create a new offer for another position.
errors.job-listing-already-validated: This job offer has already been processed and an email has been sent to the Recruiter.
errors.invalid-validation-note-length: Provide an explanation between 20 and 1000 characters on the refusal to validate this job posting.

errors.max-candidates-not-reached: Unable to close the offer. The number of candidates to be recruited has not yet been reached.
errors.future-appointments-exist: Please cancel all scheduled appointments for this offer before proceeding.
errors.start-date-in-past: The start date cannot be a past date. Please modify before proceeding.
errors.deadline-in-past: The application deadline cannot be a past date. Please modify before proceeding.
errors.unauthorized-delete-job: Only a recruiter or the owner of the offer can delete it.
errors.invalid-json-fields: The fields 'responsibilities', 'requiredQualifications', and 'benefits' must be valid JSON arrays.
errors.invalid-working-hours: Weekly working hours must be between 1 and 40. Please modify before proceeding.
errors.invalid-number-of-candidates: The number of candidates must be between 1 and 10. Please modify before proceeding.
errors.invalid-description-length: The job offer description must be between 50 and 2000 characters. Please modify before proceeding.
errors.invalid-time-format-start: The start time must be in 'HH:MM' format. Please modify before proceeding.
errors.invalid-time-format-end: The end time must be in 'HH:MM' format. Please modify before proceeding.
errors.negative-salary: The salary cannot be negative. Please modify before proceeding.

errors.JobNotValidated: Cannot save: This job offer is not yet validated by the team.

errors.JobAlreadySaved: You have already saved this job.

Cannot save:
The tracking of this offer is already handled by a consultant.

errors.UnauthorizedUser: Unauthorized user or role not found.

errors.AccessDeniedCandidate: Access denied: You must be a Candidate

errors.AdminOrConsultantOrCandidateRequired: Access denied: You must be an Administrator, Consultant, or Candidate

dialog.createJobSuccessMessage: Thank you for your job offer. An email has been sent to you. Please note that your offer will be reviewed before publication. Once reviewed and published, you will no longer be able to make changes, except the application deadline.
